title: 14 day suspension in a game that i was being flamed.....
body:
I was playing a NORMS game as ap ww just to try it out, and our renekton, teemo, and kog'maw flamed me, took a bunch of my cs, and abused me all game for it ( i will also mention teemo flamed me for ap ww, when he was teemo support with a phantom dancer, blood thirster, and building into trinitys force before he even finished his support item.) After this game i was given a 14-day suspension for abusing someone in chat ( right after they flamed me and wasted ignite )

I would like some help with the situation if possible, otherwise i just wanted to make this known to whoever may read this......

Thanks.

replies.body: Next time just mute them or ignore the messages from them you flaming doesn't fix anything, it makes it worse. After the game just easily report them and you wont get banned for flaming. It really does happen all the time it would be easier if when a report is submitted and reviewed not only does the one who is reported get checked but all the logs of that game get checked and punishments be handed out. Instead of only the one who is reported get punished. I have seen my friends get banned for that all the time, now when they join a game they inst-mute everyone they don't know and communicate with pings instead of text.

Yeah, ill mute more often, it just sucks that they never took into account that i was being flamed too. Literally in the same message i was banned for teemo told me to stop crying and flamed me. (this was right after he ignited someone and walked away)

Yeah it really does frustrate me that they just look at the reported instead of the overall picture I think it would clean up the community more and maybe even the first flamers would think twice before flaming, or it could go worse and no one would report anymore due to being scared of getting in trouble from the entire chat logs. 

What you going to do with your 14 days of no league?
Probs play some other games,  also i have a second acc that i just go to to chill and play blind pick on ( its only lv 5 so no ranked smurfing )

We *do* look at the overall picture, and in this case, the picture you painted doesn't quite exactly fit what happened. You're welcome to hit up our Player Behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for the full context of what was said and why it warranted a punishment.


Also, keep in mind that we do not discuss other players punishment with anyone but that player. They very well may have gotten a punishment as well, but that's an issue for them and no one else.

yeah there were so many times i wanted to, but my mind just kept telling me to tell them to stop and point out all the hypocritical stuff they were saying....

You can delete your chat. Look it up online.
Also you can make it so you can't type enter and you can't flame people. I did this because this is the most toxic game ever made. The game became near toxic free for me and my honor actually went up.
